TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit X509Extension extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData

summary.span: 代表 X509 擴充功能。

span.span: Represents an X509 extension.

remarks.format: ## Remarks X509 擴充功能是動態的擴充屬性加入到 X509 憑證並進行變更。X509 extensions are dynamic, extended properties that can be added to an X509 certificate and changed. 類別可用來建立與憑證相關聯，但並不屬於憑證為憑證授權單位 (CA) 所發出的延伸模組。The class can be used to create extensions that are associated with a certificate but are not part of a certificate as issued by a certification authority (CA). 在最基本的形式，X509 擴充功能有物件識別碼 (OID)、 布林值，描述是否擴充功能會被視為關鍵和 ASN 編碼的資料。In its most basic form, an X509 extension has an object identifier (OID), a Boolean value describing whether the extension is considered critical or not, and ASN-encoded data. 自訂延伸模組可以註冊於檔案。Custom extensions can be registered in a file. .Net Framework 包含的數個常見的 X509 實作延伸模組：The.NET Framework includes implementations of several common X509 extensions: - 。. 說明憑證的金鑰使用方式。Describes the key usages of a certificate. - 。. 說明憑證的條件約束。Describes the constraints for a certificate. - 。. 說明憑證的增強金鑰使用方式。Describes the enhanced key usages of a certificate. - 。. 描述的索引鍵的識別碼。Describes the key identifier. 例如，搭配使用 XMLDSIG。For example, used with XMLDSIG. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會建立空物件，不同於其他建構函式的這個類別建立物件時，用以從位元組陣列、 指標或憑證檔案的憑證資訊。This constructor creates an empty object, unlike the other constructors for this class that use certificate information from either a byte array, a pointer or a certificate file to create the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Extensions/VB/sample.vb#1)]

span.span: Copies the extension properties of the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來複製指定的擴充功能屬性並將它們新增至執行個體類別會呼叫這個方法。Use this method to copy the extension properties of the specified and add them to the instance of the class from which this method is called. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別。The following code example demonstrates using the class.
